programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat
programme.desc: Mike bir Porsche 924 uzerinde çalışıyor. Dizide yenileyebildiği ilk araba bu. Yağ kaçaklarını ve eskimiş doşemelerini tamir etmek onun iyi para kazandırmasına yetecek mi acaba?.

programme.title: Hurda Avcıları
programme.desc: Devonda Drew, bir tren tutkununun 30 yıldır biriktirdiği demiryolu parçalarına bir dalış yapıyor. Yeovilde ise, kısa sure once kapanmış bir eldiven fabrikasında hazine buluyor.

programme.title: Hurda Avcıları: Tamirat
programme.desc: Heykeltıraş Nick ve yaldızcı Ruth çok pahalı bir antika masayı onarmak için birlikte çalışıyor. Doşemeci Craig yuzyıl ortasından kalma klasik bir tasarımı onarmakta zorlanıyor.

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat
programme.desc: Çocuklar tamirciler tarafından fark edilmemiş bir Lotus Elan arayışındadır. Sonunda bir tane bulurlar ve Mike birkaç dakika surdukten sonra bu arabaya aşık olur.

programme.title: Unutulmuş Hazineler
programme.desc: Henry ve Sam, Buckinghamshireda satabilecekleri gizli otomotiv cevherleri arıyor. Sabit motorlar, çekme motorları ve eski benzin bidonları buluyorlar.

programme.title: Alaska: Son Sınır
programme.desc: Kilcher ailesi, çiftlik yaşamının zorluklarını ve keyifli yanlarını izleyicilerin sorularıyla ele alırken yeni sezona dair ipuçları veriyor.

programme.title: Alaska: Son Sınır
programme.desc: Kilcher ailesi, 80 yıldır hayatta kalmak için çeşitli aletlere ihtiyaç duyar. Çiftlik evinin ayakta kalmasını sağlayan da yine o tehlikeli aletlerdir.

programme.title: Alaska: Son Sınır
programme.desc: Alaskanın vahşi doğasında kendi kendine yetebilmek pis bir iştir. Çiftlikteki en kirli, en çamurlu ve en kanlı işler gozler onune geliyor.

programme.title: Alaska: Son Sınır
programme.desc: Doğa şartları, başka etmenler ve aile sorunları nedeniyle guçlerinin sınırında yaşayan Kilcherler ailenin zengin kırsal yaşam geleneğini surdurebilmek için birlikte çalışıyorlar.

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat
programme.desc: Mike ile Ant ender rastlanan, tavanı sert bir 1987 Alfa Romeo Spider Quadrifoglioya el atıyorlar. Ancak araçta, pervane şaftını yenilemek de dahil buyuk tamiratlar gerekiyor.

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat
programme.desc: Mike, bundan once tek bir kişinin sahip olduğu kult bir VW Corrado coupeyi çok uygun bir fiyata bulunca inanılmaz mutlu olur. Ama ucuz arabaların hep pahalı surprizleri vardır.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılmış?
programme.desc: Gundelik eşyaların yapılış ve uretiminin mercek altına alınması devam ediyor. Bu bolumun konuları yapay gozler, pet mamaları ve aynalar.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılır?
programme.desc: Modern yaşamda kullandığımız pek çok şey karmaşık muhendislik ve imalat sureçlerinin sonucunda bizlere ulaştırılıyor. Bu urunler nasıl uretiliyorlar acaba?.

programme.title: Hurda Avcıları
programme.desc: Drew and Tee, St. Austelldeki bir fabrikayı ziyaret etmek için Cornwalla gidiyor. Guneybatı maceralarına ara vererek Penzancede sorf yapıyorlar.

programme.title: Hurda Avcıları: Tamirat
programme.desc: Doşeme ustası Craig, Dr. Who dizisinde kullanılan kanepeleri kurtarmaya çalışır. Demir ustası Nev bir çift sokak lambasını bir ev için tasarımın odak noktasına donuşturur.

programme.title: Havuz Ustası
programme.desc: Anthony Archer-Wills olağanustu bir havuz ustası. Amerikanın her yerinde ev sahiplerinin çok beğenip de sahip olmak istedikleri super guzel, doğal havuzlar yapıyor.

programme.title: Tamirat Tadilat
programme.desc: Mike ile Edd, 80ler klasiği bir Ford Mustang GTyi, hem fiyatı uygun, hem de gelecek vadeden genç bir tamircinin uzerinde çalışabileceği guçlu bir araba olarak seçiyorlar.

programme.title: Kindig Garajı
programme.desc: 1957 model Bel Air dışarıdan bakıldığında tam bir klasik gibi gorunse de yapılacak çok iş vardır. Üstelik muşteri daha guçlu bir motor da ister.

programme.title: Üç Adam Dort Teker
programme.desc: Marino, Subaru Imprezanın gelmiş geçmiş en iyi yarış arabası olduğuna inanıyor. Colin McRae tarafından kullanılmış bu arabayla çıktığı tur ozel bir deneyime donuşuyor.

programme.title: Üç Adam Dort Teker
programme.desc: Drew, tarihin en başarılı yarış arabalarından biri sayılan Bugatti T35i destekliyor. İnşa edilen en iyi araba olduğunu duşunse de Marino ve Andyyi buna ikna etmesi gerekiyor.

programme.title: Tır Hikâyeleri
programme.desc: Tır şoforluğu zor: Uzun çalışma saatleri, ağır yukler ve işlek yollar yaşadıkları zorluklardan sadece birkaçı. Almanya, İtalya ve Hollandadaki tırcılar yolculuklarını anlatıyor.

programme.title: Nasıl Yapılmış?
programme.desc: Gundelik eşyaların nasıl yapıldığı yakın plana alınmaya devam ediyor. Bu bolumde oyma tahta heykeller, arklı egzersiz araçları, yanık yağ fırınları ve dolmakalemler ekranlarınızda.

programme.title: Hurda Bizim İşimiz
programme.desc: Mike, Robert ve Black Dog ekibi Virginiada Viktorya donemi evlerinden oluşan bir mahallede işe girişirler.

programme.title: Garaj Doktoru
programme.desc: ABDde garajların işleri iyi gitmiyor. Gas Monkey Garageı sahibi Richard Rawlings bilgi ve becerilerini bu garajları iyileştirmek ve bu işten kâr etmek için kullanıyor.

programme.title: Uyumsuzlar Garajı
programme.desc: Fired Up garajının başıboş tamircilerden oluşan ekibi, bu tamirhaneyi bir para makinesine çevirme niyetinde. Gas Monkeye ciddi bir rakip olabilecekler mi acaba?.

programme.desc: Georgiada polis memurları olası bir tıbbi acil durum çağrısına yanıt verir. Olay yerine vardıktan birkaç dakika sonra silahlı bir saldırgan tarafından pusuya duşurulurler.

programme.desc: Sandy ve Kenin 1967 model Camarosu babadan kalma bir araba. Sandy babasının olumunden sonra Chip ve ekibiyle temas kurarak onu eski parlak gunlerine dondurmelerini istiyor.

programme.title: Overhaulin
programme.desc: Butun VW meraklıları gibi Hot Dog Fred de Microbusuna hayrandır. Ancak Chip ve ekibinin sihirli elleri değdikten sonra ona bir daha yeni baştan aşık olacaktır.

programme.title: Hurda Bizim İşimiz
programme.desc: Ekip, Viktorya tarzı eski bir çiftlik evine gider. Mike ve Robert bir tuğla fabrikasında tuğla ormeyi oğrenirler.

programme.title: Hurda Bizim İşimiz
programme.desc: Ekibin Roanoke Kolejinden kurtardığı yapı elemanları arasında korkuluklar, tuğla doşemeler, Gotik aydınlatmalar ve 1940lardan kalma bir kasa yer alır.

programme.title: Hurda Bizim İşimiz
programme.desc: Ekibin Bostonda bir çiftlik evinden çıkardığı parçalar arasında sandalyeler, doğal boyalı paneller ve kemerli bir pencere yer alır.

programme.title: Hurda Bizim İşimiz
programme.desc: Ekip, 1930larda konserve fabrikasına donuşturulen bir demir madeninden kavisli bir kiriş, buyuk boy duduklu tencereler ve bir konserve makinesi çıkarırlar.

programme.title: Çifte Kurtuluş
programme.desc: Dave ile Cody, Laos ormanlarında kaybolma senaryosunda guçlerini birleştiriyorlar. Yanlarında yaya gezginlerin taşıdığı şeyler var- kamera, prezervatif, sigara gibi.

programme.title: Çifte Kurtuluş
programme.desc: Dave ile Cody bir dağcının en buyuk kabusunu yaşıyorlar: Yeni Zelanda dağlarında ve erzakları sınırlı. Buz dağlarını ve derin kanyonları aşmaya çalışıyorlar.

programme.title: Alaska: Son Sınır
programme.desc: Doğa şartları, başka etmenler ve aile sorunları nedeniyle guçlerinin sınırında yaşayan Kilcherler ailenin zengin kırsal yaşam geleneğini surdurebilmek için birlikte çalışıyorlar.

programme.title: Alaska: Son Sınır
programme.desc: Otto ve Charlotte İsviçrede Kilcher hikayesinin başladığı noktaya gidiyorlar. Eivin, Eve ve çocukları Alaskada çiftlikte yaşamaya devam ediyor.

programme.title: Alaska: Son Sınır
programme.desc: Kilcherler ailelerinin tarihindeki en efsanevi ve en tehlikeli maceraları yeniden yaşıyorlar. Daha once hiç gorulmemiş resimler ve izleyicilerin sorularıyla onları izliyoruz.

programme.title: Gizemli Keşifler
programme.desc: Gizem ustadı Josh Gates, yirmi yıllık dunya seyahati boyunca ozenle derlediği, akıl almaz gizemlerden oluşan saklı dosyaları keşfeder.

programme.title: Gizemli Keşifler
programme.desc: Zodyak Katiline ait ipuçları nihayet deşifre edilir. Milyon dolarlık bir hazine ortaya çıkar. Tarihi bir el yazması yaşamın kokenini aydınlatabilir.

programme.title: Blind Frog Çiftliğinin Gizemi
programme.desc: Mağaraya girmekte kararlı olan Duane, kuru bir giriş bulmak için yeni yontemler dener. Bu arada, Chad gokyuzune yukselerek doğal bir açıklık arar.

programme.title: Kırsalda Yaşamak Zor
programme.desc: Raneyler kasırgadan sağ kurtulmuş bir aileyi gormek için Missouriye gidiyorlar. Dokulen bir kulubede bir yaşıyorlar. Dahası, içmek için temiz suları da yok.

programme.title: Kırsalda Yaşamak Zor
programme.desc: Ampute Jeff ile karısı Carolun yaşanabilir bir eve, suya ve tarıma elverişli bir yere ihtiyaçları var. Raneyler ise sıfırdan bir ev yapıyorlar ve bir içme suyu kuyusu açıyorlar.

programme.title: Hurdacılar
programme.desc: Polonyanın metal hurda endustrisinin sahne arkası ekrana geliyor. Renkli tiplerle tanışıyor, malzemenin nereden geldiğini ve hurdalıktan sonra nereye gideceğini oğreniyoruz.

programme.title: Dream 10
programme.desc: Dream 10, listelerde one çıkan ve dinleyicilerin favorisi olan en populer 10 şarkıyı geri sayım formatında ekrana taşıyor. Guncel hitler, guçlu klipler ve muzik dunyasından one çıkan notlar eşliğinde izleyiciye tempolu ve keyifli bir izleme deneyimi sunan program, muziğin nabzını tutuyor.

programme.title: Yepyeni
programme.desc: Yepyeni, Turk muzik dunyasına taze bir soluk getiren en yeni şarkıları ve klipleri muzikseverlerle buluşturuyor. Guncel çıkışlar ve yeni sesler programda bir araya geliyor.

programme.title: Dream Turk En İyiler
programme.desc: Dream Turk En İyiler, listelerde zirveye çıkan, donemine damga vuran ve dinleyicilerin favorisi olan şarkıları bir araya getiriyor. Turkçe popun en guçlu isimleri ve unutulmaz hit parçalar, klipleriyle ekrana gelirken, muzikseverlere nostalji ve guncel ritmi bir arada sunan keyifli bir muzik deneyimi yaşatıyor.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Galaxy Tourists
programme.desc: Galaxy Tourists is out of this world. Following the stories of a trusty space-travelling rocket and his planet-discovering captain, this show is all about the friendship building expeditions and adventures of this space exploring pair. In classic Duck TV style this show stimulates the senses of its young audience and encourages creating thinking and imagination.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: Duck TV fitness instructors will get you up on your feet and moving. The exercises propel childrens coordination and motoring skills, essential to child development.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: My Pet Family
programme.desc: Pets are part of the family! In My Pet Family, the preschooler Tony shows us how much joy, love and responsibility comes with owning pets.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy are here to introduce little children to the concept of rhythm. The familiar duo go on many exciting adventures in which they encounter amazing animals who help them explore the wonderful world of rhythm through their clapping and tapping.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: Duckys adventures are enriched with the arrival of a new family member, her little brother Fluffy. She encounters many new situations and emotions while adjusting to his arrival.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. programme.title: Groups

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Sea Adventure

programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Shaping Up

programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Mimos World

This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Finn and Fianna

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty

Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Sounds Around Us

programme.title: Good Night!
programme.desc: Unlike most children, Lilis favourite time of the day is bedtime. Lili loves listening to lullabies before drifting off to sleep, especially with her cherished Teddy Bear. Get ready for bed with Lili and Teddy Bear, as their soothing lullabies will help young children settle down and peacefully prepare for bedtime.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: World of Toys

programme.title: Raul

programme.title: Galaxy Tourists

In classic Duck TV style this show stimulates the senses of its young audience and encourages creating thinking and imagination.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. programme.title: Small - But Hardworking

This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi

This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.desc: Kuresel piyasalar ve ekonomik gelişmeler Son Seansta yorumlanıyor; gunden geceye kalanlar ve yarının beklentileri ekranda.

programme.title: Araştırma Masası
programme.desc: Kuresel ve Turkiye piyasalarından analizler, grafiklerle yatırım araçları ve emtia-bono performansları. Tuğba Özay ile Araştırma Masası, hafta içi 10.30da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Sektorel Bakış
programme.desc: Otomotivden turizme sektorlerdeki son gelişmeler ve uzman yorumları, Lale Elmacıoğlu ile Sektorel Bakışta, hafta içi 14.00te EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Sanayi ve Ticaret
programme.desc: Sanayi ve ticaretin nabzı EKOTÜRKte atıyor. Ahu Orakçıoğlu, sanayiciler ve oda başkanlarıyla uretim, Ar-Ge ve ihracat performansını masaya yatırıyor.

programme.title: Manşet Ekonomi
programme.desc: Manşet Ekonomisi; çarşıdan pazara ekonomi, enflasyonla mucadele ve halkın gundemi. Sami Altınkaya ile hafta içi 08.00de EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Beklenti Raporu
programme.desc: Gunun ekonomik takviminde neler var? Yatırımcılar Borsa İstanbul açılmadan once hangi haber akışlarını takip etmeli? İç ve dış kuresel piyasalardaki son gelişmeler ve beklentiler neler, piyasalara yansımaları ne yonde? Sami Altınkayanın hafta içi her gun saat 08:30da sunduğu Beklenti Raporu, EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Muhakeme
programme.desc: Fatih Ergenekon ile Muhakemede, din, bilim, felsefe ve teknoloji ışığında insan, doğa ve evren uzerine duşunmeye davetlisiniz. Her Cuma 21:30da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Borsa Teknik
programme.desc: Yurt içi ve yurt dışı makro ekonomik veriler ve gelişmeler ne anlama geliyor? Ekonomik ve politik gelişmelerin finansal piyasalara olan yansımasını Perihan Tantuğ yorumluyor.

programme.title: Gun Ortası
programme.desc: Ekonomideki gelişmeler, enflasyon, faiz ve piyasalar Gun Ortasında; Turkiye ve dunya ekonomisi uzman analizleriyle ekranda.

programme.title: Lojistik Dunyası
programme.desc: Ayşegul Ketenci ile Lojistik Dunyasında Turkiyenin lojistikteki yeri, enerji ve uretim malları geçişi uzman analizleriyle Pazar 16.00da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Marka Değeri
programme.desc: Eda Elif Özbek ile Marka Değerinde Turkiye ve dunyanın guçlu markaları, başarı hikâyeleri ve ekonomik değerleri her Pazar 18:30da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Perspektif
programme.desc: Eda Elif Özbek ile Marka Değerinde Turkiye ve dunyanın guçlu markaları, başarı hikâyeleri ve ekonomik değerleri EKOTÜRKte ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Fotoğrafın Öykusu
programme.desc: Fotoğrafın Öykusu, fotoğrafların ardındaki hikâyeleri ve ilham kaynaklarını keşfeden sohbet programıdır. Fotoğrafçılar ve sanatçılar, her karedeki duygu ve anlatımı izleyicilerle paylaşır.

programme.title: Akla Ziyan
programme.desc: Prof. Dr. Nevzat Tarhan ve Eda Özdemir ile Akla Ziyan, sağlıklı zihin, guçlu ilişkiler ve iletişim uzerine EKOTÜRKte ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Yapısal Parite
programme.desc: Yapı sektoru ve finans dunyasında yenilikler Yapısal Paritede. Kıvanç İlhan ile Pazartesi 15.00te EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Yaşanabilir Dunya
programme.desc: Sibel Topaloğlu ile Yaşanabilir Dunyada iklim değişikliği, kuresel ısınma ve biyoçeşitlilik uzman konuklarla EKOTÜRKte ele alınıyor.

programme.title: Alkin Lakin
programme.desc: İki Kardeş. İkisi de ekonomist, ikisinin de Turkiye ve dunya ekonomisine dair soyleyecek çok sozu var… Bazen benzer, bazense taban tabana zıt ! Kerem Alkin ve Emre Alkin ile Alkin Lakin her Perşembe 21:30da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Yonetim Katı
programme.desc: Yonetim Kattı, ust duzey yoneticilerin deneyimlerini, iş dunyası trendlerini ve başarı hikâyelerini ekrana taşıyor.

programme.title: Gulşah Çınar ile Portreler
programme.desc: Gulşah Çınarla Portreler, iş, sanat ve cemiyet hayatının one çıkan isimleriyle samimi sohbetler ve çarpıcı anekdotlar sunuyor.

programme.title: Işimiz Sağlık
programme.desc: Diş hekimi Erhan Özgur, İşimiz Sağlıkta ozel konu ve konuklarla sağlıkta fark yaratan bilgileri paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Enerji Arenası
programme.desc: Lale Elmacıoğlu ile Enerji Arenasında, Bulent Şen ve sektor konuklarıyla enerji yatırımları, politikalar ve trendler EKOTÜRKte masaya yatırılıyor.

programme.title: Perspektif
programme.desc: Eda Elif Özbek ile Marka Değerinde Turkiye ve dunyanın guçlu markaları, başarı hikâyeleri ve ekonomik değerleri EKOTÜRKte ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Marka Değeri
programme.desc: Eda Elif Özbek ile Marka Değerinde Turkiye ve dunyanın guçlu markaları, başarı hikâyeleri ve ekonomik değerleri her Pazar 18:30da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Dış Ticarette Gundem
programme.desc: Dr. Hakan Çınar ve Erdem İlbeyi ile Dış Ticaret Dunyası, ihracat, ithalat ve Turkiyenin kuresel ticaretteki konumunu EKOTÜRKte ele alıyor.

programme.title: Rapor
programme.desc: Dunya ve Turkiye ekonomisi surekli değişiyor. Rapor programı, piyasalardaki son gelişmeleri, sektor analizlerini ve ekonomik trendleri izleyiciye detaylı şekilde sunuyor, finans ve ekonomi dunyasındaki onemli hareketleri takip etme imkânı sağlıyor.

programme.title: Yapay Zeka Kafası
programme.desc: Kaan Gulten ve Bilgi Özunal Yuvadan klonlarla yapay zeka gelişmeleri, girişimci roportajları ve ornekler Yapay Zeka Kafasında, Salı 22.00de EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Akla Ziyan
programme.desc: Prof. Dr. Nevzat Tarhan ve Eda Özdemir ile Akla Ziyan, sağlıklı zihin, guçlu ilişkiler ve iletişim uzerine EKOTÜRKte ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Davranışsal Ekonomi
programme.desc: Davranışsal Ekonomi, insanların ekonomik kararlarını yalnızca mantıkla değil, psikolojik ve duygusal faktorlerle nasıl etkilediğini inceleyen bir alandır.

programme.title: İktisattan Çıkış
programme.desc: Programda ekonomi uzmanları, akademisyenler ve sektor temsilcileri bir araya gelerek guncel ekonomik trendleri, piyasa hareketlerini ve kişisel finans stratejilerini detaylı şekilde izleyicilerle paylaşıyor. Tartışmalar, analizler ve orneklerle finans dunyasının karmaşık dinamikleri anlaşılır hale getiriliyor.

programme.title: Soyut Şeyler Ekonomisi
programme.desc: Soyut Şeyler Ekonomisi, tarihsel, kulturel ve sanatsal değerlerimizi ekonomiye taşıyan konuklarla her hafta EKOTÜRKte ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Marka Değeri
programme.desc: Eda Elif Özbek ile Marka Değerinde Turkiye ve dunyanın guçlu markaları, başarı hikâyeleri ve ekonomik değerleri her Pazar 18:30da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Pembe Masa
programme.desc: Özlem Esra Ada ile Pembe Masa Ekoturkte.

programme.title: Bayan Scarlet Ve Duk
programme.desc: 1850ler: korkusuz ve sorgulayıcı Bayan Scarlet rahmetli babasının dedektiflik burosunu Mufettiş Wellington (Duk), temizlikçi Ivy ve deneyimli duzenbaz Mosesın yardımları ile idare eder.

programme.title: Buyuk Kuçuk Tum Hayvanlar
programme.desc: James Herriot Yorshire Vadisinde bir veteriner olma hayalinin peşinden gider; hayvanları tedavi etmenin aslında sahiplerini tedavi etmek anlamına geldiğini keşfeder ve çiftçileri memnun etmek zordur.

programme.desc: Guçlu bir adalet duygusu olan Başkomiser George Gently, Northumberlandın çarpıcı yamaçları ve kıyılarında genç komiser Bacchusun yardımıyla suçları aydınlatmak için çalışıyor.

programme.title: Basketbol: EuroLeague Kadınlar
programme.desc: Avrupanın en prestijli kadın basketbol yarışması olan Kadınlar Euroleaguein maçlarını takip edin!

programme.title: Voleybol: Turkiye Kadınlar Ligi
programme.desc: Turkiyenin en ust duzey kadın voleybol liginde oynanan karşılaşmaları konu alan bir spor yayınıdır. Programda, ligde mucadele eden takımların sahadaki rekabeti, maçların temposu ve ust duzey voleybol performansları izleyiciye aktarılmaktadır. Turkiye kadın voleybolunun en onemli organizasyonlarından biridir.

programme.title: Akademiden Geleceğe
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe altyapısından yukselen genç yıldızlar ve gelecek vadeden yetenekler.

programme.title: Basketbol: Euroleague
programme.desc: Basketbol: EuroLeague, kıtanın en guçlu kuluplerinin şampiyonluk için mucadele ettiği prestijli bir organizasyondur. Yuksek tempo, yıldız oyuncular ve taktik savaşları izleyiciye heyecan dolu anlar yaşatır.

programme.title: EuroLeague Analiz
programme.desc: EuroLeague Analiz, EuroLeague karşılaşmalarını detaylı biçimde ele alan bir basketbol programıdır. Program, maçların oyun planlarını, taktik tercihleri ve one çıkan istatistikleri analiz ederek karşılaşmaları butuncul bir bakışla değerlendirir.

programme.title: Efsaneler
programme.desc: Efsanelerte, kulup tarihine iz bırakmış efsane sporcuların kariyerleri, başarıları ve unutulmaz anları ele alınıyor. Arşiv goruntuleri ve ozel hikâyelerle hazırlanan program, izleyicileri geçmişin gurur dolu anlarına goturuyor.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: One Day, Fenerbahçenin bir gunune odaklanarak kulup içinden ozel goruntuler, hazırlıklar ve dikkat çeken anları izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Gunluk tempo ve kulup atmosferi programın merkezinde yer alıyor.

programme.title: Tarihte Bugun
programme.desc: Tarihte Bugun, Fenerbahçe tarihine damga vuran maçları, başarıları ve unutulmaz anları gun gun hatırlatıyor. Sarı-lacivertli kulubun hafızasında yer eden gelişmeler arşiv goruntuleriyle izleyiciyle buluşuyor.

programme.title: Yarının Yıldızları
programme.desc: Fenerbahçenin tum yaş gruplarında yapılan çift kale maçlardan Yarının Yıldızlarında takip edin.

programme.title: Hazırlık Maçları
programme.desc: Geceyi sarı lacivert heyecanla kapatın! Takımın antrenman performansları ve hazırlık sureci yeniden ekranda.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiye ve dunyadan guncel gelişmeleri, sıcak başlıkları ve onemli olayları izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Tarafsız ve anlaşılır anlatımıyla gundemi yakından takip etme imkânı sunuyor.

programme.title: Soz Taraftarda
programme.desc: Soz Taraftarda, Fenerbahçe taraftarının maçlara, gundeme ve kulube dair duşuncelerini ozgurce dile getirdiği bir programdır. Tribunlerin sesi ve taraftarın bakış açısı ekrana yansıtılır.

programme.title: Maçın Ardından
programme.desc: Maçın Ardından, oynanan karşılaşmanın one çıkan anlarını, skorun hikâyesini ve maç sonrası gelişmeleri ele alıyor. İlk değerlendirmeler, roportajlar ve yorumlar programda yer alıyor.

programme.title: Evladıma Miras Bu Sevda
programme.desc: Nesilden nesile aktarılan Fenerbahçe sevgisinin en içten hikâyeleri. Sarı lacivert bir mirasın izinde duygusal bir yolculuk.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiye ve dunyadan guncel gelişmeleri, sıcak başlıkları ve onemli olayları izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Tarafsız ve anlaşılır anlatımıyla gundemi yakından takip etme imkânı sunuyor.

programme.title: Fenerium Saati
programme.desc: Fenerium Saati, Fenerbahçenin resmi mağazası Feneriumda yer alan urunleri tanıtıyor. Yeni sezon koleksiyonları, ozel tasarımlar ve kampanyalar programda izleyiciyle paylaşılıyor.

programme.title: Basketbol: Kadınlar Super Ligi
programme.desc: Turkiye Basketbol Federasyonu tarafından duzenlenen Turk kadın basketbolunun en ust seviye ligi.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiye ve dunyadan guncel gelişmeleri, sıcak başlıkları ve onemli olayları izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Tarafsız ve anlaşılır anlatımıyla gundemi yakından takip etme imkânı sunuyor.

programme.title: Turkiye Sigorta Basketbol Super Ligi
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Sportif
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe spor takımlarını tum yonleriyle ekranlara getiren "Sportif" programı FB TV ekranlarında yayınlanıyor. Futboldan voleybola, atletizmden yuzmeye kadar her alanda faaliyet gosteren Fenerbahçenin Turk sporuna olan katkıları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Tarih Ve Fenerbahçe
programme.desc: Tarih ve Fenerbahçe, sarı-lacivertli kulubun kuruluşundan bugune uzanan tarihini, onemli donum noktalarını ve unutulmaz başarılarını ele alıyor. Arşiv bilgileri ve anlatımlarla kulubun hafızası ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Şevval Şirin İle Guncel
programme.desc: Şevval Şirin ile Guncel, Turkiye ve dunyadan en sıcak gelişmeleri gundem başlıkları altında izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Siyaset, ekonomi, sağlık, kultur-sanat, spor ve toplumsal olaylar; canlı bağlantılar, ozel roportajlar ve uzman yorumlarıyla ele alınıyor.

programme.title: Konsol
programme.desc: Konsol Programı, oyun ve oyuncu dunyasındaki en guncel gelişmeleri izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Yeni çıkan oyunlar, konsol incelemeleri, turnuvalar, donanım tanıtımları ve uzman yorumlarıyla hem eğlenceli hem de bilgilendirici bir deneyim sunuyor. Oyunseverler için haberler, ipuçları ve oneriler tek çatı altında toplanıyor.

programme.title: Hava Durumu
programme.desc: Hava Durumu, Turkiyenin dort bir yanından gelen guncel meteorolojik verilerle izleyiciyi bilgilendiriyor. Sıcaklıklar, yağış ihtimalleri, ruzgâr durumu ve bolgesel değişimler sade bir anlatımla ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Kuş Bakışı
programme.desc: Kuş Bakışı, doğal yaşam alanlarını, şehirleri ve kulturel mirası benzersiz bir perspektiften ekrana taşıyor. Havadan çekimlerle zenginleşen anlatım, izleyiciyi farklı coğrafyalara gotururken her bolumu gorsel bir keşfe donuşturuyor.

programme.title: Şevval Şirin İle Guncel

programme.title: Oto Flash
programme.desc: Oto Flash, otomobil dunyasındaki en guncel gelişmeleri, yeni çıkan modelleri ve dikkat çeken yenilikleri izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Test suruşleri, teknik detaylar ve kullanıcı deneyimleriyle araçlar tum yonleriyle ele alınıyor.

programme.desc: Flash TV Haber, Turkiye ve dunya gundemindeki en onemli gelişmeleri hızlı ve guvenilir biçimde izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Deneyimli spikerler ve muhabirler aracılığıyla siyaset, ekonomi, kultur, sağlık ve spor gibi birçok alanda kapsamlı haberler sunuluyor.

programme.desc: Flash TV Haber, Turkiye ve dunya gundemindeki en onemli gelişmeleri hızlı ve guvenilir biçimde izleyiciyle buluşturuyor. Deneyimli spikerler ve muhabirler aracılığıyla siyaset, ekonomi, kultur, sağlık ve spor gibi birçok alanda kapsamlı haberler sunuluyor.

programme.title: We Were the Lucky Ones
programme.desc: Halinanın gucu ve umudu sınanır. Addy, Rioda yeni bir hayat kurar.

programme.title: White Collar
programme.desc: Çekici dolandırıcı Neal Caffrey hapishaneden kaçar, ancak duşmanı FBI Ajanı Peter Burke tarafından yeniden yakalanır. Birkaç seçeneğe sahip olan Caffrey, nihai ozgurluğu karşılığında buronun diğer yakalanması zor suçluları alt etmesine yardım eder. Ancak çok geçmeden Caffrey, kendini hapse ya da olume geri dondurmek isteyenlerle kedi fare oyunu oynarken bulur.

programme.title: The Resident
programme.desc: The Resident, ulkenin dort bir yanındaki hastanelerde hem iyi hem kotu olmak uzere gerçekte olanları açığa çıkarmak için olayların perdesini aralar. Chastain Hastanesinde her gun kişisel ve mesleki zorluklarla karşı karşıya kalan bir grup doktorun başından geçenleri anlatır.

programme.title: How i Met Your Mother
programme.desc: How I Met Your Mother, Ted (Josh Radnor) ve nasıl aşık olduğu ile ilgili bir komedi. Her şey Ted’in en yakın arkadaşı Marshall’ın (Jason Segel) uzun suredir birlikte olduğu anaokulu oğretmeni kız arkadaşı Lily’e (Alsyson Hannigan) evlenme teklif etmeye karar vermesiyle başlıyor. Gerçek aşkı bulmayı umut eden Ted’e, tescilli bekar arkadaşı Barney (Neil Patrick Harris), çılgın ve arsız yontemleriyle, kadınlarla tanıştırarak yardımcı olmaya çalışıyor. Ted, Robin (Cobie Smulders) ile tanışıyor ve bunun ilk goruşte aşık olduğuna oldukça emin. Fakat kaderin Ted için farklı planları var.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Başarılı cinayet-gizem romanı yazarı Richard Castle ile tanışın! Castle o kadar başarılı ki fanlarından biri, kitaplarındaki cinayetleri aynı şekilde işlemeye başladığında yolu NYPDden Kate Beckett ile kesişir ve bu cinayetleri birlikte çozmeye çalışırlar.
